statements: SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM PatientRecords WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM PatientRecords WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, age, medical_history FROM PatientRecords WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientRecords WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM PatientRecords WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 40
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT patient_name, age FROM PatientRecords WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='M';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT Patients.full_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id ORDER BY MedicalRecords.record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC, full_name ASC
SELECT full_name, address FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis = 'COVID-19'
SELECT MIN(date_of_birth) AS earliest_dob, MAX(date_of_birth) AS latest_dob, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients
SELECT full_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE Patients.full_name LIKE '%Smith%' OR Patients.full_name LIKE '%Johnson%'
SELECT full_name, treatment FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT appointment_date, reason FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 123456;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' AND address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT patients.first_name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE medical_records.doctor='Dr. Smith'
SELECT DISTINCT doctor FROM medical_records

SELECT patients.first_name, medical_records.diagnosis, appointments.appointment_date FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.id = medical_records.patient_id JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.reason='Check-up' ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, name, dob, address FROM Patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialization FROM Doctors;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY name ASC, dob DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, gender, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND dob BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';

SELECT Patients.name, Appointments.date, Doctors.specialization FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id WHERE Appointments.date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY Appointments.date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT Doctors.name AS DoctorName, MedicalRecords.date AS RecordDate, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, MedicalRecords.treatment FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id JOIN MedicalRecords ON Appointments.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id ORDER BY MedicalRecords.date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT Patients.name, Appointments.date AS ApptDate, Appointments.time AS ApptTime FROM Appointments JOIN Patients ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE Patients.address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY Appointments.date ASC, Appointments.time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, blood_type FROM Patients;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT lab_name, test_name, test_result FROM Labs WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE years_of_experience > 5 ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM Patients JOIN Medical_History ON Patients.patient_id = Medical_History.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT lab_name, test_name, test_result FROM Labs WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
